description: Israel says it has entered Gaza's largest hospital in a "targeted operation against Hamas".
maintext: Dr Mokhallalati told the BBC on Wednesday the hospital was without power, oxygen and water. On Tuesday, surgeries had been carried out without proper anaesthesia, with patients "screaming in pain". Doctors were unable to help one patient with burns, and had to just "let him die".
title: Al-Shifa: What we know about Israel's raid on Gaza's main hospital
